description:
From our law office in Denver, Colorado, the dedicated legal professionals at Bowman Law LLC, provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients across our region who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients adversely affected by any of the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Bicycle accidents
  • Pedestrian accidents
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Dog bites and animal attacks

Our lawyers possess an extensive amount of legal knowledge and experience, and we have literally written the book on Colorado Personal Injury Claims, which we offer as a free resource from our website. This means you can expect to receive the highest level of representation possible directly from a highly qualified attorney who has your best interests at heart. We promise to do all we can to help you obtain the favorable outcomes you expect and the justice you deserve.

Our lawyers have earned top peer review ratings from Martindale-Hubbell. We have also received "Superb" client ratings on Avvo, and our law firm has enjoyed countless testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To begin the process for yourself or a beloved family member, you can contact Bowman Law LLC, to schedule a free initial consultation concerning your claim. Our law office also currently offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you safe and healthy.
